awards:
第74届柏林国际电影节(2024)
　　最佳处女作奖(提名) 詹妮弗·乌里韦·阿尔萨特

　　第72届圣塞巴斯蒂安国际电影节(2024)
　　地平线大奖(提名) 詹妮弗·乌里韦·阿尔萨特

writer.name: 詹妮弗·乌里韦·阿尔萨特 Yennifer Uribe Alzate

director.name: 詹妮弗·乌里韦·阿尔萨特 Yennifer Uribe Alzate

introduction: Sandra is a single mother. She lives with her teenage son and works as a security guard. One morning, on taking a different bus route than usual to a new security post, she meets Javier behind the wheel. The two often coincide on his routes and her strong attraction to him leads to an affair. In the midst of exhausting working days, they enjoy time off with their colleagues. Sandra squares up to her personal life, realises that she is much more than a mother and embarks on a road to freedom through her own experience of desire.
